title: Белоснежка
author: Derevyanko Nataliya
description:
This artpiece is based on the famous fairy tale about Cinderella and the Seven Dwarfs. It tries once again to remind a fascinating idea about the good that always triumphs over evil, that a fate smiles and rewards the honest and hardworking ones. The direction is fantasy. This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'Cinderella' is related to fantasy being a representative of fantasy-art genre. 

This artwork has a Guiness certificate for being exhibited in more than 10000 meters height. It took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
